chart.title: Traffic Size Anomalies Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic where $Z$ by _time,All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.transport span=10m | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | `per_panel_filter("ppf_traffic_size","src")` | timechart minspan=10m sum(count) by transport

table.title: Traffic Size Details
table.searchTemplate: | tstats `summariesonly` max(_time) as lastTime,min(All_Traffic.bytes) as min_bytes,avg(All_Traffic.bytes) as mean_bytes,max(All_Traffic.bytes) as max_bytes,dc(All_Traffic.dest) as dc(dest),count from datamodel=Network_Traffic where $Z$ by All_Traffic.src | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | appendcols [inputlookup append=T start=0 max=1 traffic_bytes_tracker | rename mean_bytes as tracker_mean | fields tracker_mean,stdev] | filldown tracker_mean,stdev | eval Z=round(((mean_bytes-tracker_mean)/stdev),2) | `per_panel_filter("ppf_traffic_size","src")` | rename ppf_filter as filter | eval bytes=if(min_bytes==mean_bytes AND mean_bytes==max_bytes,floor(min_bytes),"min: ".floor(min_bytes)."|avg: ".floor(mean_bytes)."|max: ".floor(max_bytes)) | `makemv(bytes)` | sort - filter,Z | `uitime(lastTime)` | table src,filter,bytes,dc(dest),count,Z,lastTime
